body_html:
reading the docs again, it states that

Since z is needed for at least one branch of the cond, the tf.multiply operation is always executed, unconditionally. Although this behavior is consistent with the dataflow model of TensorFlow, it has occasionally surprised some users who expected a lazier semantics.

This covers the problem I am facing. Closing this issue.

body:
reading the docs again, it states that 
> Since z is needed for at least one branch of the cond, the tf.multiply operation is always executed, unconditionally. Although this behavior is consistent with the dataflow model of TensorFlow, it has occasionally surprised some users who expected a lazier semantics.

This covers the problem I am facing. Closing this issue.
